wedo2.intro: He huinga waihanga a LEGO® Education WeDo 2.0 e taea ai te waihanga i ō ake mihini pāhekoheko. Whakapiria he paraka waehere o Scratch e taea ae te pāhekoheko ki ō waihanga LEGO WeDo me te tuku i ngā hākorikori ki te mata.
wedo2.requirement: Kua tukua he toronga LEGO WeDo 2.0 mō te Mac OSX me Windows 10+ hoki.
wedo2.getStarted: He Ara Hei Tīmata mō LEGO WeDo 2.0
wedo2.installText: Mā te Device Manager ka taea ai te hono a WeDo 2.0 ki Scratch mā te whakamahi i a Bluetooth
wedo2.setupText: Whāia ngā tohutohu o te Matapihi Tīwhiri ki te hono ki tō WeDo 2.0
wedo2.createText: Whakamahia ngā paraka toronga mō WeDo ki te whakakā i ngā rama, whakahaere i ngā pūrere, ā, tukua kia pāhekoheko tō pūtere.
wedo2.versionText: Ka taea hoki e koe te waihanga waehere Scratch mō ngā momo LEGO WeDo taketake (LEGO WeDo 1.0).
